sentences.sContent: I knew I could rely on David.
sentences.sCn: 我知道我可以信赖戴维。

sentences.sContent: They relied heavily on the advice of their professional advisers.
sentences.sCn: 他们非常依赖专业顾问的建议。

sentences.sContent: ...there is no such thing as a “perfect” memory—their extraordinary minds are still using the same flawed tools that the rest of us rely on...
...This rat detection method doesn't rely on specialist equipment...
...there is less need to rely on social or family pressures to keep couples together...
...We must rely on the honesty and good faith of others...

remMethod.val: re(一再) ＋ ly(音似lie， 撒谎) → 又撒谎了， 不值得信赖 → 信赖

trans.tranOther: to depend on something in order to continue to live or exist
